open.title: Vuma Villages Outage | Western Cape
open.description: We are investigating reports of degraded service on the Vuma Villages network in the Western Cape. Afrihost engineers are attending to the fault. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: FrogFoot outage | Eastern and Western Cape
closed.description: We are aware of a connectivity problem in Cape Town,Port Elizabeth George, Stellenbosch and surrounding areas. This is affecting client making use of FrogFoot fibre connections. Affected clients will have limited to no connectivity. Engineers are working on resolving the problem. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Services have been restore and we are monitoring for stability.
